questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) A art and chair
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A historical scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A painting or artwork
C) A group of people
D) An animal

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A modern sculpture
C) A historical painting
D) A family portrait

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A beach
C) An indoor setting
D) A mountain range

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A chair
B) A table
C) A plant
D) A statue

What type of artwork is depicted in the photo?
A) Abstract painting
B) Historical scene
C) Modern art
D) Landscape painting

What color is the frame around the artwork?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Black

What is the style of the artwork?
A) Abstract
B) Realistic
C) Impressionist
D) Baroque

What is the attire of the people in the artwork?
A) Modern clothing
B) Historical costumes
C) Casual wear
D) Sports uniforms

What kind of furniture is visible in the artwork?
A) Modern furniture
B) Antique furniture
C) Outdoor furniture
D) Office furniture

How many people are depicted in the artwork?
A) Two
B) Three
C) Four
D) Five

What is the mood of the scene depicted in the artwork?
A) Somber
B) Joyful
C) Angry
D) Calm

What is the material of the chair in the foreground?
A) Wood
B) Metal and plastic
C) Fabric
D) Stone

What is the condition of the floor in the photo?
A) Carpeted
B) Wooden
C) Tiled
D) Concrete

What architectural element is visible in the artwork's background?
A) A chandelier
B) A column
C) A window
D) A staircase

What is the lighting like in the photo?
A) Bright and natural
B) Dim and artificial
C) Dark and shadowy
D) Overexposed

What is the relationship between the chair and the artwork?
A) The chair is part of the artwork
B) The chair is in front of the artwork
C) The chair is behind the artwork
D) The chair is to the side of the artwork

What is the texture of the artwork?
A) Smooth and glossy
B) Rough and textured
C) Matte and flat
D) Reflective

What is the posture of the people in the artwork?
A) Sitting and standing
B) Lying down
C) Running
D) Climbing

What kind of headwear are the people in the artwork wearing?
A) Helmets
B) Hats with feathers
C) No headwear
D) Caps

What is the gender of the people in the artwork?
A) All male
B) All female
C) Mixed genders
D) Indeterminate

What is the setting of the artwork?
A) Outdoor garden
B) Indoor room
C) Street scene
D) Seaside

What is the perspective of the artwork?
A) Bird's eye view
B) Eye level
C) Worm's eye view
D) Side view

What is the composition of the artwork?
A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical
C) Radial
D) Grid

What is the artistic genre of the artwork?
A) Portrait
B) Landscape
C) Genre painting
D) Still life

What is the artistic medium used in the artwork?
A) Sculpture
B) Painting
C) Drawing
D) Engraving
